mapper.select:
SELECT c.id, c.parentId, t.theme, c.content, c.createName, c.createTime, c.updateName, c.updateTime FROM aqara.speedytheme t, aqara.speedycontent c where t.id = c.parentId
AND t.theme like concat('%',#{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
order by c.parentId
mapper.insert: insert into speedyContent ( parentId, content, createName, createTime, updateName, updateTime ) values ( #{parentId}, #{content}, #{createName}, NOW(), #{updateName}, NOW() )
update from speedyContent where id = #{id} set parentId = #{parentId} and content = #{content} and theme = #{theme}
mapper.delete: delete from speedyContent where id in (#{id})
